text: Issi tarah hum ney aap ko iss ummat mein bheja hai jiss say pehlay boht si ummaten guzar chuki hain kay aap enhen humari taraf say jo wahee aap per utri hai parh ker sunaiye yeh Allah rehman kay munkir hain aap keh dijiye kay mera paalney wala to wohi hai uss kay siwa dar-haqeeqat koi bhi laeeq-e-ibadat nahi ussi kay upper mera bharosa hai aur ussi ki janib mera rujoo hai
